summary: A semi-paralyzed radio reporter is sent out to investigate a story that leads him into an odd subculture and on a journey of disturbing self-realization.
cast: Nick Stahl|Leonardo Nam|Rachel Black|Jessica Hecht|Jacob Pitts|Ashlie Atkinson|Jamie McShane|Pablo Schreiber|Jeane Fournier|Carmela Marner|Phil LaMarr|Matthew Carey|Ben Siegler|Michal Sinnott|Joshua Leonard|Vera Farmiga|For Chan|James Frain|Aimee Mullins|Dylan Bruno|Kate Burton|Ellen Marlow|Tommy Nelson|Gregory Dann|Josh Folan|Tia Dionne Hodge|Richard Serlen
title: Quid Pro Quo
